players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Let's focus on the fact that Charlie was found dead. We need to figure out who did it and why."
Bob: "I think we should investigate Diana more thoroughly, considering the evidence from last night. We need to know if they're telling us the truth about their alibi."
Diana: "I'm innocent, I swear. I was at home all night, and I didn't leave my room. You can ask Bob if you want to confirm."
